meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels clearly display 02271.8, translating to 2271.8 m³. The red pointer on the circular dial is observed just past the 0.04 mark, specifically pointing to the second minor tick after 0.04. Each minor tick represents 0.001 m³, making the dial reading 0.042 m³. The total reading is the sum of these two values. The angle calculation assumes 0.00 on the dial starts at 36 degrees clockwise from the 12 o'clock position (top center), with a full 0.10 m³ revolution being 360 degrees.
